alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 3:00PM EDT until July 11 at 12:34PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Williams River At Rockingham. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EDT Monday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 11.9 feet this evening. It will then fall late this evening. It will rise to 11.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.0 feet on 03/29/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Williams River Rockingham Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 2 pm: 9.6 Forecast: Mon 2 pm MSG Mon 8 pm 11.2 Tue 2 am 10.8 Tue 8 am 7.7 Tue 2 pm 6.2 &&
